page.shortlink: ux list convert data source sql options properties convert data source type
page.description: Information about the current and target data sources.

description.p: The current data source type. This property is read only. It can either be *[ui:Static]* or *[ui:SQL]*.

The target data source type. If the *[ui:Current datasource type]* is "Static", this property can only be *[ui:SQL]*. If the *[ui:Current datasource type]* is "SQL", this property can only be set to *[ui:Static]*.

ref.link: ux list control Converting Static Data into SQL Data

see.ref: Converting Static Data into SQL Data
